channel.title: Quest makin troubles
channel.description: hey, im trying to create a quest. i've got pretty much all of it down. the last thing i need is i need it to where if a player clicks "talk to" on the npc i want them to, they start the quest, or in other words the quest = 1. AND how do i get an npc i just spawned to drop a certain item?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2008, 04:09:56 AM[/size][hr]anybody?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2008, 06:08:41 AM[/size][hr]no one can help?

item.title: Quest makin troubles
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

hey, im trying to create a quest. i’ve got pretty much all of it down. the last thing i need is i need it to where if a player clicks “talk to” on the npc i want them to, they start the quest, or in other words the quest = 1. AND how do i get an npc i just spawned to drop a certain item?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2008, 04:09:56 AM[/size][hr]anybody?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2008, 06:08:41 AM[/size][hr]no one can help?
